trans-unit.source: Exposes the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*> method, which allows <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> data to be custom filtered.
trans-unit.target: Viser den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*>metode, som tillater <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"> </xref> data egendefinerte filtrert.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint*>

trans-unit.source: The IDataPointFilter interface exposes the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method, which takes a specific data point within a series and returns a `Boolean` value that determines whether that data point will be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Grensesnittet IDataPointFilter viser den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>metoden som tar en bestemt datapunktet i en serie og returnerer en `Boolean` verdi som bestemmer om datapunktverdien filtreres.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: To perform custom filtering: - Derive a new or existing class from this interface.
trans-unit.target: Til å utføre egendefinert filtrering:-avledet en ny eller eksisterende klasse fra dette grensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: - Override the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method to provide the custom filtering logic.
trans-unit.target: -Overstyre den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>metode for å angi egendefinert filtrering logikken.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To initiate the filtering operation, call one of the `Filter` methods in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class that takes an IDataPointFilter object as its first parameter.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil starte filtrering operasjonen ringe en av de `Filter` metodene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>klassen som bruker et IDataPointFilter-objekt som første parameter.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>

trans-unit.source: For sample source code, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: For eksempelkildekode, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter.FilterDataPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a particular data point in the series will be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om en bestemt datapunktet i serien filtreres.

trans-unit.source: This method should be called for each data point in a series, and returns a `Boolean` value indicating whether a data point should be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden må kalles for hvert datapunkt i en serie, og returnerer en `Boolean` verdi som angir om et datapunkt skal filtreres.

trans-unit.source: To provide custom filtering, derive a new or existing class from the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> interface and then implement this method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi egendefinerte filtrering avledet en ny eller eksisterende klasse fra den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>grensesnittet og Implementer denne metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>

trans-unit.source: Provide custom criteria matching logic, then return `true` or `false` to mark the data points to be filtered.
trans-unit.target: Angi egendefinerte vilkår samsvarende logic, og returnerer deretter `true` eller `false` å merke datapunkter som skal filtreres.

trans-unit.source: After this method has been implemented, use one of the `Filter` method definitions in the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator> class that takes an <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> object as a parameter to perform the filtering.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoden er implementert, bruker du én av de `Filter` metodedefinisjoner i den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>klasse som tar en <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter>objektet som en parameter til å utføre filtreringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IDataPointFilter> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator>

trans-unit.source: Filtered points, by default, are removed from a series.
trans-unit.target: Den filtrerte punkt fjernes som standard fra en serie.

trans-unit.source: They can also be displayed as empty points by setting the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: De kan også vises som tomt punkt ved å angi verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterSetEmptyPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: Filtered points can also be marked as filtered if they do not match filtering criteria, as determined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>value.
trans-unit.target: Filtrerte punkt kan også være merket som filtrert hvis de ikke samsvarer med filtrering vilkår, i henhold den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>verdi.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataManipulator.FilterMatchedPoints%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Series"></xref> object that the data point belongs to.
The index of the data point, which determines its position in the series.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen til datapunktet som bestemmer plasseringen i serien.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the data point is removed, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>Hvis datapunktet fjernes, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
